Name: Riese & Muller Culture Touring
Description: The Riese & MÃ¼ller Culture Touring is a perfect blend of style, comfort, and performance. This e-bike is designed for those who appreciate the convenience of city commuting but also enjoy leisurely rides in their free time. Here are some of its key features:  Motor:Â The Cultures are equipped with the brand newÂ Bosch Performance Line motor, the SX can deliver up to 600 watts of power in their most compact motor yet. Battery:Â Equipped with the new Bosch CompactTube CPT 400Wh "In-Tube" battery with the option add the PowerMore 250 range extender. Drivetrain:Â The bike features the Shimano CUES RD-U6000 10 speed shifting system. This drivetrain is known for its precision and reliability, ensuring smooth gear changes and optimal performance. Bosch System:Â The bike uses the Bosch Smart system.Â The system is designed for all components to work seamlessly together, providing a smooth and efficient riding experience. Features and Accessories:Â As with all Riese & Muller eBikes you can also upgrade aspects of the bike. The additional options include the Bosch purion 200 display, Suspension forks and seatpost, 250Wh Range extender battery, MIK Cargo rack and a security frame lock.  Please continue further down the page for a more detailed look at the Culture Touring.

Name: Riese & Muller Roaster4 Mixte Vario
Description: The Riese & MÃ¼ller Roadster4 Mixte Vario is a stylish, step-through electric bike that blends everyday practicality with advanced riding comfort. Powered by the Bosch Performance Line motor and a 625â¯Wh integrated battery, it offers smooth and responsive assistance for city commutes and beyond. The Enviolo stepless hub gear system and Gates carbon belt drive provide silent, maintenance-free shifting, while the lowered top tube ensures easy mounting and dismounting. With a Suntour suspension fork, powerful Magura hydraulic disc brakes, and integrated lighting, the Roadster4 Mixte Vario delivers a fast, elegant, and highly capable ride for any urban journey.

Name: Riese & Muller Load4 75 Vario - Peanut Matt - NEW
Description: The Load4 75 is Riese & Muller's latest Bosch Smart System e-Cargo with full suspension Control Technology. It has the the largest loading surface from the Load model range. This particular model comes with low side walls and child cover with three adjustable seats (two seperate side by side and a single seat in front) with padded 5-point belts and footwell to give comfortable seating positions. Fitted with Bosch's Smart Cargo Line motor with 85Nm of torgue, with walk assist and hill hold,Â Intuvia 100 display and 545Wh battery. Also comes with the optional rear carrier and additional chain that is attached to the frame lock helping you secure the bike properly. A handy saddle bag safely stores the chain when not in use. This is like no other e-Cargo bike, supreme quality and comfort. Key Features: Colour: Peanut Matt  Bosch Cargo Line smart system motor 85Nm Bosch Intuvia 100 display Bosch 545Wh Powerpack battery Low sidewalls with child cover Three child seats with footwell Rear carrier Additional chain lock with bag

Name: Riese & Muller Carrie Touring
Description: Introducing the Carrie Touring, Riese & Mullers new e-Cargo / e-Family bike. This all new compact cargo bike is only slightly longer than a normal e-Bike and thanks to its inovative cargo area one of the narrowest long-john style cargo bikes on the market. This makes it much easier to find a parking place and also makes navigating around town much less stressful. The touring version features a conventional 10 speed derailleur shifting system by Microshift. The optional "Flex Box" cargo option can be opened up to provide enough space for two children or larger cargo loads. It features a minimulist aluminium frame available in 3 bold glossy colours.  Gross vehicle weight is: 200kg Maximum rider weight is: 110kg Overall length is: 209cm Bike weight is: 34.4kg

Name: Riese & Muller Swing4 Silent 46cm Bordeaux - NEW
Description: Riese & MÃ¼ller Swing4 Silent â Elegant, Effortless, and Exceptionally Quiet The Swing4 Silent offers a beautifully smooth and silent riding experience with all the comfort and practicality youâd expect from a classic city bike â reimagined with premium electric power. Fitted with the reliable Shimano Nexus 8-speed hub gears, operated by a simple twist grip, and a low-maintenance Gates carbon belt drive, this model is designed to take the hassle out of everyday travel. Perfect for leisurely rides, daily errands, or your morning commute, the Swing Silent combines traditional styling with modern technology, making every ride a pleasure. Description: The Rohloff SpeedHub electronic gear system is operated using simple up/down shift buttons to replace the traditional mechanical gearshifters. Name: Riese & Muller Carrie City
Description: Introducing the Carrie City, Riese & Mullers new e-Cargo / e-Family bike. This all new compact cargo bike is only slightly longer than a normal e-Bike and thanks to its inovative cargo area one of the narrowest long-john style cargo bikes on the market. This makes it much easier to find a parking place and also makes navigating around town much less stressful. The City version features the Shimano Nexus 5-speed gear system and conventional chain drive. The optional "Flex Box" cargo option can be opened up to provide enough space for two children or larger cargo loads. It features a minimulist aluminium frame available in 3 bold glossy colours. Gross vehicle weight is: 200kg Maximum rider weight is: 110kg Overall length is: 209cm Bike weight is: 35.7kg

Name: Riese & Muller Packster2 70 CT Vario.
Description: Now in Our Showroom â Ready to Ride Riese & MÃ¼ller Packster2 70 CT â Full-Suspension Family E-Bike Comfort, Control, and Versatility â All in One Ride The Packster2 70 CT is the ultimate family e-bike designed for maximum comfort, smooth riding, and complete control â even off-road. With Riese & MÃ¼llerâs Control Technology, you can confidently navigate any terrain, and the environmentally-friendly transport box allows you to carry everything you need in style. Included Features: Riese & MÃ¼ller Control Technology â Front wheel suspension and rear swing arm keep you in control, even at high speeds. Bosch Cargo Line (Smart System) motor â Powerful, efficient, and smooth performance. 750Wh Bosch PowerTube battery â Long-lasting energy for longer rides. Kiox 300 Display â A smart system for easy monitoring of performance and route data. Enviolo 380 (Heavy Duty) gears â Reliable, seamless shifting. EPP Transport Box â Fully recyclable, made with zero emissions, and offers complete protection for your cargo. Three Child Seats â With 5-point seat belts and side impact protection ensure your passengersâ safety. Buggy â Easy access for children with half-height side walls. Rear Carrier â Can carry up to 15kg for additional cargo capacity. Â  Buggy Option â Safe, Comfortable, and Practical Child Transport: The Buggy option is designed with your family's safety and comfort in mind, offering a smart solution for transporting children worry-free. Easy Access:Thanks to the half-height side walls and integrated pedal step, children can get in and out of the transport box effortlessly and independently. Built for Protection:The aluminium frame supports a sturdy polypropylene roof that also serves as collision protection for the rider. No PVC film materials are used â the permanently fitted, water-repellent cover is crafted from sustainable materials for healthier riding. Flexible Weather Shielding: Tinted side windows can be partially or fully rolled up depending on the weather. A roll-up rear wall concealed beneath the roof connects to the side walls via a Velcro strip, shielding passengers from wind and rain. Offers a bright and airy ride for children while maintaining maximum protection. Weight Capacity:Approved for loads of up to 70 kg in the transport box. Â  Three Child Seats â Flexible, Safe, and Sustainable Family Transport: The Packster2 70 offers a thoughtfully designed three-child seat configuration, enabling you to carry up to three children aged seven or younger in comfort and safety. Versatile Seating Layout: A double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions ensures a relaxed ride for two children. A rear-facing single front seat offers a cozy, secure space for a third child. All seats are equipped with five-point safety harnesses for maximum protection. Sustainable Materials:The child seats feature integrated continuous headrests and are made from 100% recycled materials, reflecting our commitment to sustainability. Smart Storage Options: The third seat cushion folds back, transforming into a separate luggage compartment when needed. For even more cargo capacity, the double seat cushions fold up to the rear, and the front seat cushion folds forward, creating extra room for larger items. Â  Designed for the Future: Manoeuvrability Made Easy â Thanks to cable-controlled steering, you can navigate tight spaces, even when fully loaded, with ease. Fully Integrated, Secure and Easy to Ride â Whether you're running errands, enjoying a family outing, or tackling off-road adventures, the Packster2 70 CT is built to perform in any situation. Â  Available now for test rides and purchase at Ebike Barn Free UK Mainland Shipping Includes Full Manufacturer's Warranty
